summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Human Hair Wigs for Black Women-Glueless Full Lace Wigs with Baby Hair Brazilian Hair Water Wave 130% Density Natural Color 20inch
Review Date: 2017/02/12
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.81 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches; 9.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '602731543407'}
Review Text: This wig is a great value for the price. The hair is very soft and doesnt tangle. Minimum shedding, nothing major or beyond average. The density is on the low side so it gives a natural appearance. If you like big, diva hair you might now like the 130% density.
Review Title: Great wig for the price! Good Value
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: You get what you pay for.

Rating: 3.0

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gold & Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch (60 pcs) by Petitfee
Review Date: 2019/07/09
Store: Petitfee
Product Description: ['PTFP06-IG']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Petitfee', 'Scent': 'Hydrogel', 'Unit Count': '60 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.19 x 3.19 x 1.69 inches; 3.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '023071019375 748616751793 755332334339 776529926069 784179516226', 'Manufacturer': 'Petitfee'}
Review Text: Tried to use as much and as many as i could to judge the effects. I didn't really notice anything different. Had a small tingling sensation when applied and left slim residue.
Review Title: No noticeable difference
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml)
Review Date: 2019/08/15
Store: No Name Necessary
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Review Text: This primer is nothing short of amazing. The mist that a nozzle gives is a huge deal when it comes to coverage. Some times if the mist is too much its just too messy. But the mist on this one is so fine I barely felt anything on my face when I was applying it and had to be sure that I was even getting product on my faec and opened my eyes to check. I did use more than the recommended amount, which I found to be a bit on the low side since the size of the mist is so small the amount of product that you get out on a single spray is minimum. After I applied, I watched in the mirror as it dried, and the effects were amazing. My shine do go away and I could literally see my pore getting smaller. I could see myself using this alone on a hot summer day without makeup because the finish it gave was just that great. My makeup also went on very easy and smooth and felt as if it was gliding across my face and not going into every wrinkle and groove. I didn't wear my makeup anything close to 16 hours but I did make it through a 8 hour workday flawless. Defiantly a staple now in my makeup bag.
Review Title: Very fine mist
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Maynice Soft Nature 3D Mink Stripe Lashes WIth Package 1 pair Y50
Review Date: 2020/07/25
Store: Maynice
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.72 x 2.17 x 0.59 inches; 1.06 Ounces', 'UPC': '743811077808'}
Review Text: Loved these lashes. They are super comfortable and great for everyday wear. The band is perfect and not super thick at all.
Review Title: Love love love
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Newcally False Eyelashes 3D Thick Volume Faux Mink Lashes 5 Pairs Multipack
Review Date: 2020/12/19
Store: Newcally
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Newcally', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Cotton', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.8 x 0.8 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '732376372145'}
Review Text: The bands are a bit thick, but they are good starter lashes the glam side.
Review Title: Good starter lashes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has experienced several positive interactions, particularly with products offering great value and effectiveness. They appreciated the softness and natural appearance of the wigs and found them to be a good deal for the price. The primer's fine mist and impressive oil control were highlighted, making it a new staple in the user's makeup collection. Additionally, the user expressed satisfaction with the comfort and wearability of the lashes, indicating they were well-suited for everyday use.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
On the flip side, the user encountered negative aspects related to certain products. One wig received average ratings, with the user noting that it did not meet expectations regarding density. In skincare, the eye patches did not deliver noticeable results, leading to disappointment. They also mentioned the primer's spray quantity as being insufficient, requiring more product to achieve desired results, indicating a potential flaw in the product design.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user has a mixed shopping experience. While they enjoyed positive aspects such as good value, comfort, and effective makeup solutions, certain products left them underwhelmed due to performance issues or product design flaws. The positive reviews indicate preference for value-driven and effective products, whereas the negatives suggest a need for improvements in effectiveness and usability across some purchases.

target_interaction.title: Too plastic looking
target_interaction.text: Did not like these at all. They dont blend well, bands are thick and I dont like whatever they made these with. Seems like cheap plastic. They work for dramatic pictures for modeling but everyday these are a no go.
target_interaction.title_meta: Newcally Eyelashes 25MM Long False Lashes Faux Mink Dramatic Messy Lashes 5 Pairs
